article_title: U.S. Rep. Ann Wagner talks shutdown, debt default
article_text:
Please enable Javascript to watch this video

(KTVI)-St. Louis area Congresswoman Ann Wagner serves the 2nd Congressional District of Missouri. She has been a major player in Republican negotiations with the White House and has been a leading voice for Republicans opposing the Affordable Care Act.

Does she feel responsible for the policies that pushed a shutdown? And has she given up on trying to get rid of Obama-care completely?
